videos.description: Kyle Kuzma drives right through Duncan Robinson for the hoop and the harm.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kyle Kuzma overpowers Duncan Robinson for and-1 bucket) 2021/12/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kyle Kuzma overpowers Duncan Robinson for and-1 bucket

videos.description: Jimmy Butler banks home his shot off the backboard despite being fouled.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jimmy Butler goes high off the glass for tough basket) 2021/12/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jimmy Butler goes high off the glass for tough basket

videos.description: Spencer Dinwiddie goes up top to Daniel Gafford for the alley-oop slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Gafford throws down the alley-oop) 2021/12/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Gafford throws down the alley-oop

videos.description: Jimmy Butler sends a pinpoint pass to Omer Yurtseven for an easy dunk down low.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Butler threads the needle to Yurtseven for the slam) 2021/12/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Butler threads the needle to Yurtseven for the slam

videos.description: Spencer Dinwiddie dials up a long-distance lob to Daniel Gafford for an alley-oop.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dinwiddie lobs alley-oop from beyond half court) 2021/12/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dinwiddie lobs alley-oop from beyond half court
